settings.title: Infuse, Erase, Brighten. Reclaim Radiant Skin With  Micro Infusion System
settings.infotext_1: Stimulates collagen whilst infusing active ingredients directly into your skin for immediately visible results.
settings.infotext_2: Quickly boost the appearance of your skin and feel confident at any age for a fraction of the usual clinic price.
settings.infotext_3: No downtime, virtually painless, and performed safely in the comfort of your home.

settings.txt: Saves time, money and hassle of attending in-clinic treatments
Quick and easy 5 minute facial booster with no downtime
Perfect before a big event to instantly enhance your skin
Safe to be performed from the convenience and comfort of your home
Treatment serums customized to your skin targets your specific concerns

settings.title: 5 reasons why everyone is using Qure Micro-Infusion System
settings.text:
The ”dull” to “dewy” at-home facial your skincare routine is missing that saves you hundreds of dollars.

Up until recently, Micro-Infusion was only performed by cosmetic dermatologists as an expensive in-clinic facial. Often used by Celebrities before a big even to get ‘red carpet ready’ skin

Now, you can easily and safely perform it from home, in less than 5 minutes for 15x less than the average clinic’s price.

settings.title: Trusted by celebrities and people just like you around the world
settings.color_text: “Even my esthetician is hooked! And I can now visit beauty clinics less often.”
settings.text: Give yourself a “clinic quality” glow up WITHOUT the “clinical prices”. The same technology used in clinics by dermatologists, boosting your overall skin appearance, quickly. No appointments, no waiting, no hassles.
settings.list:
Helps reduce appearance of fine lines

Smooth fine lines and wrinkles

Instant results, wake up with dewy fresh skin

Increases serum absorption

Proven results backed by science and clinical research

Leave the device upside down for 1-2 minutes. During this time, wash your face and make sure your hands are clean.
Once the serum has had enough time to make its way into the needles, you can take off the lid and start microinfusing!
Start at the center of the face and work your way outward to cover the full face. Stamp with a 50% overlap...

settings.heading: How To Use
settings.text: 5 Minutes Total, Every 2-4 Weeks

“I was hesitant at first as I didn’t know how much it would hurt but to my surprise it was pretty painless. The 2nd day after the treatment, my skin has the best natural glow! I was also happy to to see how much my pigmentation had lightened after 3rd treatment :)

I switch between the serums depending on how my skin is before the treatment.”
settings.name: Glorija

settings.text: “I just turned 57 years. My skin was extremely dry and while using this product my skin RETURNED to LIFE! I am so impressed with it! My Coworkers ask me what I use in my skin.. and I tell them. Product easy to use and the needles are better that using a pen for microneedling. This is an amazing product that you will not regret in purchasing it. I really see the change in my skin. Outstanding job QURE!”
settings.name: Glorija

settings.text: “I personally think my products absorbed better, my skin looks a bit brighter and that larger acne scar on my right cheek has started to fade after just TWO treatments!”
settings.name: Glorija

settings.text:
“Skin is GLOWING!

I’m on my third treatment (doing them every 2 weeks) and I’ve been loving the results so far! Upon after using so there is some redness but no pain and I wake up so hydrated with bouncy skin.”
settings.name: Glorija

settings.text:
“Shocked at the results after just one treatment!I’m not one to usually leave reviews... but I was shocked at how my skin looked the morning after my first treatment!

Texture was soooo much smoother, my skin looked clear, glowy and healthy. The system was so easy to use and I can’t wait until my next treatment.”
settings.name: Glorija

settings.text:
“I heard about micro-infusion in clinics but couldn’t afford to fork out hundreds of dollars for a treatment. So when I saw this online I jumped at buying it instantly. Yes, it doesn’t stamp in botox and filler BUT personally I LOVE the results and how easy it is to use myself at home.

It works great for my skin, I have noticed my skin texture is much smoother and brighter.”
settings.name: Ann

settings.text:
“I committed to the 3 month saver bundle and after 6 treatments (2 weeks apart) I’m SO happy with the results!!! My pores are smaller and I have mainly noticed a difference in my skin texture.

My skin goes a little red straight after the treatment but that quickly goes away. It’s a little uncomfortable when I do it on my forehead but it’s fine everywhere else. Totally worth it!!!”
settings.name: Jess

settings.text: “I have used many topicals to help with post acne marks. This micro-infusion system has given me the most consistent results. Absolutely love it!”
settings.name: Glorija

settings.text:
“Plumper more hydrated skin!

After the first use of EGF, my skin was plumper, more hydrated and skin tone improved radically, literally the next day. Love this product, will definitely be purchasing more as its really helped smooth out the fine lines also”

settings.title: Results you‘ll see with your own eyes
Step 01
settings.text: Twist open the chamber of the device and fill with one ampule of serum. Twist to close it tight. Optional: You can mix two serums and fill it until it’s 3/4 full.

settings.title: Step 02
settings.text: Leave the device upside down for 1-2 minutes. During this time, wash your face, make sure your hands and treatment area is clean.

settings.title: Step 03
settings.text: Once the serum has had enough time to make its way into the needles, you can take off the lid and start microinfusing!

settings.title: Step 04
settings.text: Start at the centre of the face and work your way outward to cover the full face. Stamp with a 50% overlap. Repeat 2-3 passes for better results.

settings.title: Step 05
settings.text: Take any leftover serum and pat it onto your face and neck). Leave the serum on overnight so your skin can drink up all those skin-enhancing ingredients.

settings.title: How To Use
settings.text: 5 Minutes Total, Every 2-4 Weeks
Stamping creates CLEAN “micro channels” WITHOUT over-damaging skin
No downtime & faster healing of the skin
New needle heads provide sharp, straight needles for every treatment - more effective
No disinfecting required. Disposable needle heads minimize risk of infection & irritation
settings.text_mob: disposable heads mimizes risk of infection/ irritation

settings.text: 24K gold needles delivers serum DIRECTLY into skin for maximum absorption & results
settings.text_mob: maximum absorption & results as serum delivered DIRECTLY into skin

settings.text: Rolling needles creates wider irregular "micro channels" causing unessesary damage of skin
Slower recovery time & longer healing of the skin
Needles become blunt after several uses & creates unnecessary skin trauma - less effective
Bacteria accumulates if not disinfected well. This highly increases risk of infection & irritation
settings.text_mob: risk of infection/ irritation is increased if not disinfected well

settings.text: Superficial product penetration with serum applied topically & being pushed down into skin whilst rolling
settings.text_mob: less effective absorption of serum as applied topically

settings.title: More effective and safer than other at-home needling devices
settings.text: Unlike at-home needle roller devices, micro-infusion doesn’t require downtime, is virtually painless, and can be performed safely in the comfort of your home.
settings.left_text: Get clinical results from the comfort of your own home - for a fraction of the usual cost. Your money is saved back after you skipped one clinic visit.
settings.right_text: Professional micro-needling treatments are effective, but multiple, regular sessions are required to see long term results - these are expensive and time consuming.  At-home needling devices can be unsafe and damage skin.

settings.title: The Difference is clear
settings.text: (Here’s a comparison, but there is really no comparison)

settings.title: What can it do for your skin
settings.text:
Reveals a smoother, evenly radiant complexion, generating a glow effect. Collagen-stimulating, dark spot brightening, and wrinkle-combatting properties restores youthful skin.

Skin Concerns: Fine lines and wrinkles, rough texture, dark spots, dryness.

settings.title: Clinical research
settings.text:
..Participants saw improvement in wrinkles, pigmentation, skin tone, overall brightness and skin moistness.

Citations...
Draelos, Z. (2016). The Effect of a Combination of Recombinant EGF Cosmetic Serum And A Crosslinked Hyaluronic Acid Serum As Compared To A Fibroblast-Conditioned Media Serum On The Appearance Of Aging Skin. Journal Of Drugs In Dermatology.

Laato, M. (1987). Epidermal Growth Factor Increases Collagen Production In Granulation Tissue By Stimulation Of Fibroblast Proliferation And Not By Activation Of Procollagen Genes. Biochem Journal.

settings.title: All ingredients
settings.text:
Fragrance-free, Alcohol-Free, Paraben-Free. Vegan. No Preservatives Added.

Epidermal Growth Factor (EGF):

Works at a cellular level to repair and rejuvenate skin. Reduces appearance of wrinkles, improves hydration, and prevents pigmentation.

Other ingredients:

Niacinamide: Derm-approved superstar ingredient that helps with most skin concerns from soothing to brightening and clarifying, and reducing fine lines and wrinkles.

Butylene Glycol: Expert-backed hydrator that improves penetration to help it perform more effectively.

Glycerin: Replenishes moisture skin loses into the deeper layers of the dermis and makes skin appear dewy.

All ingredients:

Rosa Damascena Flower Water, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Allantoin, Sodium Hyaluronate, sh-Oligopeptide-1, Carbomer, Arginine, Ethylhexylglycerin.

settings.title: What can it do for your skin
settings.text:
Instant, intense hydration. Effectively plumps up fine lines, reduces redness, boosts and protects the skin barrier for healthy, supple skin.

Skin Concerns: Dehydration, dryness, redness, fine lines, dull skin.

settings.heading: Choose Your Treatment Options
settings.text:
Rest assured that all orders are one-time purchases.

You will not be charged again in the subsequent months, and there are no hidden charges.

When you are ready to reorder your treatment, you can purchase needle heads and serum of choice.

settings.question: When will I see results?
settings.ans:
Micro-Infusion treatment is an effective skin booster treatment, and you’ll notice a radiance boost, softer fine lines and overall a healthy fresh complexion in the next day or two.

The more treatments you perform the greater skin benefits over time you’ll receive! This quick and easy home facial is perfect to perform a day or two before a big event, when you need to look to boost your skin’s complexion, fast.

Don’t forget to keep up with your everyday skincare routine to boost the effectiveness of your Microinfusion results and keep skin healthy, hydrated, and glowing long-term.

settings.question: Is it painful? Does it hurt?
settings.ans:
You get to experience minimal discomfort and maximum results with Qure's Micro-Infusion System!

Although the needles themselves are actually longer than most at-home needling systems (making it more effective), the ultra-fine needles are thinner than a human hair, so that means you’ll feel minimal to no pain during treatment.

During the initial stages of treatment, you may experience a slight sensation or prickling feeling as the needles make contact with the skin but you’ll quickly get used to the feeling quickly.

settings.question: Can you use it around the eyes and on the neck?
settings.ans:
Yes, you can micro-infuse around the eye area to help smooth crows feet. Just ensure to apply a very gentle pressure and only do 1 pass. Monitor your skin accordingly as everyone’s skin is different!

Performing Micro-Infusion on the neck can help improve the appearance of fine lines, and rejuvenate skin. It can target issues such as neck creases, horizontal lines, and age-related skin concerns to help enhance the overall texture, tone, and youthfulness of the skin.

settings.question: How often can I do the treatment?
settings.ans: We recommend a Micro-Infusion treatment every 2 weeks for the best results!

settings.question: When is the best time to perform a Micro-Infusion treatment?
settings.ans: We recommend doing the treatment at night before bed. Avoid being in the sun and using makeup for 24 hours after the treatment. For more information on post treatment care, visit our safety guide.

settings.question: How many treatments do I get out of one Micro-Infusion device?
settings.ans: Each needle head is to be used one time per treatment, and disposed of after each treatment. This minimizes the risk of infection and unnecessary damage to the skin. Use 1 full serum ampoule per treatment.

settings.question: Can I use any serum?
settings.ans: Please keep in mind that not all serums are suitable for Micro-Infusion. Some may cause irritation and should be avoided! We have developed our potent serum ampoules that are perfect for Qure’s micro infusion system. They are formulated to have low risk of irritation and with no fragrance.

settings.question: What are the benefits of Micro-Infusion?
settings.ans:
The needles of the Micro-Infusion device and the stamping action triggers the body’s natural healing process and in turn helps reduce appearance of fine lines, making your skin look firmer and fine lines look softer.

The serum booster that you choose to infuse during your Micro-Infusion will determine the major benefits of your treatment. Very fine needles infuse micro-droplets of concentrated serum at a specific depth into the dermis (top layer) of your skin precisely where they are needed to accelerate absorption of active ingredients that target specific skin concerns.

You can switch up your treatments and even mix the two serums together!

A few more benefits:

  • More even skin tone and texture
  • Glowing, fresh complexion
  • Softer fine lines
  • Firmer, rejuvenated skin

settings.question: Can I use any serum with my microinfusion device?
settings.ans: Please keep in mind that not all serums are suitable for micro-infusion. Some may cause irritation and should be avoided! We have developed our potent serum ampoules that are perfect for Qure’s micro infusion system. They are formulated to have low risk of irritation and with no fragrance.

settings.question: Is there any aftercare that I should follow post treatment?
settings.ans:
After you’ve infused your skin with all that skin boosting serum, try to keep the skin clean for 24 hours and follow these post treatment guidelines:

  • The day after treatment, wash your face with a gentle cleanser and apply a nourishing moisturizer.
  • Users may experience minor redness and irritation after the procedure but should quickly subside. Skin may experience mild swelling, peeling or flaking. You can minimize these effects by keeping the skin moisturized, which will reduce shedding and alleviate tightness.
  • Skip makeup for as long as you can, but at minimum, at least 24 hours.
  • No exercising or strenuous activity for the first 24 hours post-treatment. Sweating and gym environments are harmful, rife with bacteria, and may cause adverse reactions.
  • Keep in mind, anything you put on your skin after using Qure Microinfusion will absorb more easily, so it’s important to keep the skin clean and use products that don’t have harsh ingredients (no acids!).
  • Avoid touching your face, especially with dirty hands that haven’t been sanitized.
  • Avoid swimming, saunas and steam rooms for at least 24 hours post-treatment.
  • Avoid applying skincare products containing fragrances, active ingredients or acids such as Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Beta Hydroxy Acid, Retinol (Vitamin A), Vitamin C or anything perceived as ‘active’ skincare including scrubs or toners for at least 2-3 days post-treatment, as it may cause irritation.
  • Avoid exfoliating products for 2-3 days after treatment because they can be abrasive on skin when it is in that kind of condition.
  • Avoid direct sun exposure immediately after treatment. Apply a high protection sunscreen when going outdoors, and avoid prolonged sun exposure. Use good quality non-comedogenic sunscreen if going in the sun.

By the next day, you should be free to resume your normal activities, skincare routine, and any makeup you want to apply—but you may not even need it. Just ensure you monitor your skin’s reaction.

settings.question: Are there any side effects?
settings.ans:
Everyone’s skin is different. You may experience a bit of skin redness for the first few hours after treatment. However, this should be minimal and disappear quickly.

We recommend consulting with your dermatologist or doctor before use if you suffer from any skin condition. A patch test on an area of your skin that isn't too exposed prior to treatment is also recommended, to have a better understanding of how your skin will react and the downtime you should expect.

settings.question: What’s the difference between home micro-needling rolling and micro-infusion?
settings.ans:
Micro-needling focuses on stimulating your body's own collagen by creating micro-injuries. But it doesn’t deliver any ingredients directly into your skin.

With microinfusion, you not only reap the benefits of micro-needling, but also deliver active ingredient solutions to target your specific skin concerns - This makes it work quicker and more effectively.

settings.question: Is there any aftercare that I should follow post treatment?
settings.ans:
After you’ve infused your skin with all that skin boosting serum, try to keep the skin clean for 24 hours and follow these post treatment guidelines:

  • The day after treatment, wash your face with a gentle cleanser and apply a nourishing moisturizer.
  • Users may experience minor redness and irritation after the procedure but should quickly subside. Skin may experience mild swelling, peeling or flaking. You can minimize these effects by keeping the skin moisturized, which will reduce shedding and alleviate tightness.
  • Skip makeup for as long as you can, but at minimum, at least 24 hours.
  • No exercising or strenuous activity for the first 24 hours post-treatment. Sweating and gym environments are harmful, rife with bacteria, and may cause adverse reactions.
  • Keep in mind, anything you put on your skin after using Qure Microinfusion will absorb more easily, so it’s important to keep the skin clean and use products that don’t have harsh ingredients (no acids!).
  • Avoid touching your face, especially with dirty hands that haven’t been sanitized.
  • Avoid swimming, saunas and steam rooms for at least 24 hours post-treatment.
  • Avoid applying skincare products containing fragrances, active ingredients or acids such as Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Beta Hydroxy Acid, Retinol (Vitamin A), Vitamin C or anything perceived as ‘active’ skincare including scrubs or toners for at least 2-3 days post-treatment, as it may cause irritation.
  • Avoid exfoliating products for 2-3 days after treatment because they can be abrasive on skin when it is in that kind of condition.
  • Avoid direct sun exposure immediately after treatment. Apply a high protection sunscreen when going outdoors, and avoid prolonged sun exposure. Use good quality non-comedogenic sunscreen if going in the sun.

By the next day, you should be free to resume your normal activities, skincare routine, and any makeup you want to apply—but you may not even need it. Just ensure you monitor your skin’s reaction.

settings.question: What’s the difference between home micro-needling derma roller and microinfusion?
settings.ans:
Micro-needling focuses on stimulating your body's own collagen by creating micro-injuries. But it doesn’t deliver any ingredients directly into your skin. The reuse of needles can cause unnecessary damage to the skin and has a higher risk of infection as using alcohol does disinfect the tool, but it is difficult to sterilize it completely and the needles also become blunt when reused, which severely compromises technique.

With microinfusion, you not only reap the benefits of micro-needling, but also deliver active ingredient solutions to target your specific skin concerns - This makes it work quicker and more effectively.

Qure’s microinfusion system has single-use needle heads which are disposed of after each to ensure that any risk of infection is minimal - unlike at-home microneedling rollers multiple times.

settings.question: What is the length of the needles?
settings.ans: Qure’s microinfusion system needle heads are 0.5mm length for “epidermal-needling” which is designed to enhance skin-care ingredient absorption and skin texture .

settings.question: How do I use/ perform the Micro-Infusion facial?
settings.ans:
1. Twist open the chamber of the device and fill with one (1) ampule of serum and secure the lid back on the device.
Option: You can mix two of the serums to treat multiple concerns!

2. Leave it upside down for 1-2 minutes. During this time, you can wash your face and make sure your hands are nice and clean.

3. Once the serum has had enough time to make its way into the needles, you can take off the lid and start stamping!
Start at the center of the face and work your way outward to cover the full face. Stamp with a 50% overlap. This means each time you stamp you overlap the previous stamp halfway.
If you would like more collagen-building on a specific area such as a stubborn divot or acne scar, you can go over it 2-3 times to target that concern. If you have any active blemishes, you can get as close as possible, but avoid stamping directly on any active breakouts on the skin.

4. Repeat 2-3 passes for better results.

5. Take any left over serum and pat into your face and neck so your skin can drink up all that yummy serum. (Hack: take any leftover serum from the bottle and pat it onto your face and neck).

settings.question: How do I clean the device?
settings.ans:
Once you’ve finished stamping your way to brighter and plumper skin, follow the below cleaning instructions:

  1. Twist off the needle head with the cap attached and safely dispose.
  2. Wash the chamber out with water and gentle cleanser.
  3. Let the device air dry completely, on a clean surface, before packing away.
  4. Open a brand new needle head and attach the needle head onto the device. Ensure hands are clean and don’t open the cap of the needle head.

settings.question: How does the 90-day money back guarantee work?
settings.ans: You have 90 days to try Qure’s Micro Infusion System and see the results for yourself. If you don’t see any difference in your skin— if you do not experience firmer, brighter, younger-looking skin, simply contact us and we will gladly refund your money. This guarantee applies to the 3 month supply bundle. You’ll just need to provide before and after photos after each 2 week treatment to qualify.
